posts.post_content:
First email to [url]craig_w67217@yahoo.com[/url] saying "I'll take it" gets it. 

Unless otherwise noted, price includes S&H for First Class mail with delivery confirmation. 

Paypal (no extra charge), check, money order all ok. 

Please contact me prior to paying with paypal as I use an account different than my email. 


Scans are here:  [url]http://s285.photobucket.com/albums/ll71/craigw67217/For%20Sale/[/url]
